document.full_text: indiana governor mitch daniels on tuesday signed sweeping abortion restrictions that would ban the procedure after 20 weeks of pregnancy and cut funding to planned parenthood of indiana.
document.title: daniels signs abortion curbs as he mulls white house bid
lines_and_colors: indiana governor mitch daniels on tuesday signed sweeping abortion restrictions that would ban the procedure after 20 weeks of pregnancy and cut funding to planned parenthood of indiana.
